snippet: Gloria Allred, who represents more than 20 of Mr. Cosby’s accusers, said it was too late for the women to take legal action because the statute of limitations had expired.
abstract: Three more women, including former Mrs America Lisa Christie, come forward and accuse Bill Cosby of drugging or sexually assaulting them; Cosby has repeatedly denied similar allegations by dozens of women.
lead_paragraph: Gloria Allred, who represents more than 20 of Mr. Cosby’s accusers, said it was too late for the women to take legal action because the statute of limitations had expired.

headline.main: Bill Cosby’s List of Accusers Grows by 3
headline.print_headline: 3 Women Join Ranks of Cosby’s Accusers
